name: Roshambo World
description: Survive as long as you can from endless waves of enemies in Roshambo World. Switch between Rock, Paper, and Scissors to get the edge over your enemies and destroy them before their numbers grow to large. Watch your back as enemies deal extra damage when attacking from behind! Purchase upgrades in the shop to make your character stronger to help you survive longer. Purchase arrows to destroy your enemies from a distance. Purchase walls to block your enemies from passing for a period of time. Over time, build up your supercharge, a powerful ability which makes your character grow in size and strength to eliminate your enemies with ease.
